[quote=“Davidi2, post:3, topic:372109”]Change

to
mes(this);[/quote]

I already fixed by using this frames.sendMessage(p2, “Make sure you loot the money to exchange for better items”); withous mes void but ty for your help

@davidwombat it just tells ppl to loot the cash to exchange into prizes but i cant get npc trade interface to work

item.title: Death message 508, whats wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Iboxer Iboxer
item.description:
@Iboxer wrote:

Please tell me whats wrong with this

	if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(absX, absY) && !clanWarsFightArea() && !blackTeam && !whiteTeam) {
		dropStuff(enemyIndex);
		Engine.items.createGroundItem(995, 1000000, this.absX, this.absY, this.heightLevel, p2.username);
		mes();
	}

private void mes(Player p) {
if (p == null) {
return;
}
p.frames.sendMessage(p, “Make sure you loot the money to exchange for better items”);
}

I get this error

Compiling palidino76.rs2.player
.\palidino76\rs2\player\Player.java:1692: mes(palidino76.rs2.player.Player) in p
alidino76.rs2.player.Player cannot be applied to ()
mes();
^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
